TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {1019=Lobbying Disclosure Act of 1995 (Section 5) - All Filers Are Required to Complete This Page, 40792=S. 460/H.R. 1010 The Fir Minimum Wage Act of 2013 - NETWORK strongly supports an increase in the minimum wage, particularly to include increased and rising minimums for tip workers. NETWORK urges Congress to hold in highest importance the creation of jobs and support of those without work., 22443=NETWORK opposes the use of drones in targeting Al Qaeda and their affiliates NETWORK urges the President to expedite the troop withdrawal from Afghanistan through 2013, 33243=H.R. 933 As Amended; "An Act making consolidated appropriations and further continuing appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2013." NETWORK opposes the cuts to Section 8 Rental assistance programs, public housing, homeless assistance and CDBG, 16440=Urging the President and Congress to maintain a Circle of Protection around the most vulnerable in our nation. Urging Congress to find alternatives to sequestration which will protect those who are most vulnerable. Reminding Congress that job creation/unemployment still remain a pressing concern to the faith community. Urging Congress to eliminate the MEADSystem, as over budget and ineffective NETWORK strongly encourages Congress to reduce spending by the Pentagon, in ways that do not jeopardize our troops. This might include elimination of "no-bid" contracts, elimination of added funding for cost and time-overruns, and abiding by the results of an annual audit. This assumes that there will be an annual audit commencing in the next 2 years. Loook for savings in the 2014 budget request of DOD S Con. Res. 8 NETWORK strongly supports the Senate Budget, the Progressive Caucus Budget and the House Minority Budget H. Con Res. 25 NETWORK strongly opposed this House Budget for FY 2014.}
